items.text: short, sits up nicely with just enough room available outside off for him to swat it through cow corner
items.shortText: Abu Hider to Gulbadin Naib, FOUR runs

items.text: this one's even better. Too short, uses with the angle from around the wicket to muscle a pull a few steps to the left of deep square leg. One-bounce over the ropes
items.shortText: Abu Hider to Gulbadin Naib, FOUR runs

items.text: presses forward and defends into the off side
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Rashid Khan, no run

items.text: gets the foot forward and drives to long-off
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Rashid Khan, 1 run

items.text: tossed up outside off, driven to long-off
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Gulbadin Naib, 1 run

items.text: gets down to sweep and guides it perfectly through backward of square leg
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Rashid Khan, FOUR runs

items.text: inside edge onto the pad as Shakib slides one into his leg stump
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Rashid Khan, no run
Shakib Al Hasan to Rashid Khan, 1 run

items.text: short, stays firm on the backfoot and pulls, deep square moves to his left and gets around it
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Rashid Khan, 1 run

items.text: shortish outside off, fails to get on top of it and gets an outside edge to third man
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gulbadin Naib, 1 run

items.text: back of a length on middle and off, punched to midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Rashid Khan, no run

items.text: short of length, punched crisply straight to cover
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Rashid Khan, no run

items.text: cuts in from a back of a length, manages to find a gap at cover on the backfoot punch
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Rashid Khan, 1 run

items.text: length outside off, pushes out to mid-on for a quick one
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gulbadin Naib, 1 run

items.text: full on the stumps, coming into him, and he uses the pace and angle to whip muscularly through midwicket
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Gulbadin Naib, FOUR runs

items.text: walks across early and shovels a length ball to long-on
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Gulbadin Naib, 1 run

items.text: short outside off, arches away and just swats it off the top edge down to fine leg
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Rashid Khan, FOUR runs

items.text: that's timed to stunning perfection. Not even a full swing as he's cramped for room on a short one, but very meaty.. over deep midwicket
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Rashid Khan, SIX runs

items.text: shortish outside off, slower ball, slapped to sweeper cover
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Rashid Khan, 1 run

items.preText: joynul: "over rate has been sansational considering the heat and other team's over rate!!!! " Absolutely
items.text: pushes a fuller one to long-on
items.postText: Seventeen off that over; more of those needed for Afghanistan
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Gulbadin Naib, 1 run

items.text: walks down the track, telegraphs it, and the bowler drags the length back.. forced to defend back
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gulbadin Naib, no run

items.preText: Soothsayer: "Who else feels that Afghanistan will be one of the top teams competing with the likes of India, Aus, Eng,SA consistently? They seem to be the most improved teams in recent times"
items.text: slower length ball outside off, swing and a miss
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gulbadin Naib, no run

items.text: full, just nips away a tad, no feet as he swings and misses
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gulbadin Naib, no run

items.text: short outside off, scythes it away to the sweeper at cover
items.postText: James: "Soothsayer: possibly in LOI shortly (a few years). It will take longer for them to get the test experience."
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gulbadin Naib, 1 run

items.text: length, angled in, helped away to deep fine leg. 200 up
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Rashid Khan, 2 runs
